questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "DEGREE LEVEL : COMPUTER SYSTEMS DESIGN (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)" ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? questions.question_text_1: A computer system uses a 6-bit binary code to represent characters. How many distinct characters can this system represent?
question_texts: A computer system uses a 6-bit binary code to represent characters. How many distinct characters can this system represent?

options.option_text: 2 or more inputs are at logic 1
2 or more inputs are at logic 0
Any odd number of inputs are at logic 0
Any odd number of inputs are at logic 1

questions.question_text_1: Given that NOT and 2-input AND/OR gates have delays of 1 ns, what will be the maximum delay of a 3x8 decoder circuit? Note: if the answer is 1 ns, write 1.
question_texts: Given that NOT and 2-input AND/OR gates have delays of 1 ns, what will be the maximum delay of a 3x8 decoder circuit? Note: if the answer is 1 ns, write 1.
